channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)

item.title: CVE-2023-7085|2024-08-28T15:36:59.154Z -- unknown -- scalable%20vector%20graphics%20%28svg%29
item.description: The Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) WordPress plugin through 3.4 does not sanitize uploaded SVG files, which could allow users with a role as low as Author to upload a malicious SVG containing XSS payloads.
